official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow Federal employees to seek election to local office, and otherwise take an active part in political management or in political campaigns relating to and election to such an office.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to allow Federal employees to seek election to local office or take active campaign roles in such elections.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow Federal employees to seek election to local office, and otherwise take an active part in political management or in political campaigns relating to and election to such an office.
